div.div: Map of current potential habitat (CPH) of Mussismilia harttii.
div.p: Highlighted figures (A, B, C and D) show the different areas in the M region: A) Ceará and north of Rio Grande do Norte States; B) South of Rio Grande do Norte, Paraíba, Pernambuco and north of Alagoas States; C) South of Alagoas and north of Bahia States; D) south of Bahia and Espírito Santo States.
